prompt: Transform this image into a cyberpunk scene — neon signs, rainy streets, reflective wet surfaces, moody rim lighting, cinematic color grading, 16:9 aspect.
comment: Trending for neon aesthetics and viral night‑city edits (sources: GodOfPrompt, SellDone).

prompt: Turn this photo into a Studio Ghibli–style illustration — soft watercolor palette, delicate linework, whimsical background elements, warm golden-hour glow.
comment: Ghibli/anime nostalgia is huge on socials; widely recommended in tutorials (GodOfPrompt, SellDone).

prompt: Convert this portrait into a 3D Pixar-style character — polished cinematic render, expressive features, subsurface scattering, soft depth of field.
comment: Popular for profile avatars and family/pet edits (GodOfPrompt, Cem Eygi Media video).

prompt: Design a luxury magazine cover using this image — Vogue-inspired layout, elegant typography, cover lines, barcode, glossy retouching and editorial color grade.
comment: Used for personal branding and viral before/after posts (GodOfPrompt).

prompt: Remove unwanted objects and extend the background while keeping the subject intact — match perspective, texture, and lighting; avoid distortion.
comment: High-demand utility prompt for quick object removal and scene replacement (Skylum guide).

prompt: Lightly retouch skin: remove redness and blemishes, even skin tone, preserve natural texture and facial detail; keep realistic lighting.
comment: Faces-first retouching prompt trending for natural results in portraits (Skylum).

prompt: Enhance clarity and upscale resolution — denoise, sharpen, preserve facial features and original style, avoid over-smoothing or artifacts.
comment: Upscaling and quality restoration remain top requests for repost-ready images (Skylum, GodOfPrompt).

prompt: Turn this scene into a layered paper‑cut collage — textured paper edges, soft layer shadows, limited vibrant palette, print‑ready ratio.
comment: Paper‑cut and craft styles are trending for unique social posts and merch (SellDone, MilesWeb).

prompt: Transform the image into a LEGO-style diorama — minifigure likenesses, studded-brick textures, bright saturated colors, shallow depth of field.
comment: Nostalgic, family-friendly style that performs well on social platforms (SellDone, MilesWeb).

prompt: Generate a JSON-style vector logo pack: return consistent color palette, icon grid, SVG path data, usage specs, and exports for light/dark backgrounds.
comment: Practical prompt for consistent brand assets; credited in prompt collections and Ben Milsom's tests (video + prompt credits).

prompt: Turn this image into Japan anime style — bold linework, large expressive eyes, soft sunset lighting, filmic depth-of-field
comment: Anime/Ghibli-inspired edits are viral for avatars and profile pics across multiple guides (Selldone, MilesWeb).

prompt: Transform this photo into a neon cyberpunk scene — rainy night, glowing signs, misty reflections, dramatic rim lighting
comment: Cyberpunk aesthetics keep trending for cinematic social posts and nightlife edits (GodOfPrompt, Selldone).

prompt: Convert this portrait into a Pixar/3D-style cartoon — soft cinematic lighting, rounded expressive features, polished render
comment: 3D/Pixar-style avatars are highly sharable and perform well on social platforms (GodOfPrompt, YouTube guides).

prompt: Create a Studio Ghibli–style illustration — soft watercolor palette, delicate linework, cozy fantasy elements
comment: Ghibli-style fantasy edits remain popular for warm, nostalgic visuals (multiple blog roundups).

prompt: Apply an oil-painting effect with visible brushstrokes and Rembrandt-inspired chiaroscuro lighting
comment: Classical painting filters are trending for high-impact portraits and art-market style posts (GodOfPrompt).

prompt: Design a luxury magazine cover using this image — Vogue-style layout, elegant typography, barcode and cover lines
comment: Magazine-cover mockups are viral for personal branding and portfolio showcases (GodOfPrompt).

prompt: Expand the image canvas seamlessly (outpaint) — extend background, preserve central subject, continue perspective and textures
comment: Outpainting/expand prompts are hot for repurposing photos and creating wider compositions (Skylum guide).

prompt: Retouch skin naturally — remove redness and blemishes, even skin tone, preserve pores and natural texture
comment: Naturalistic retouching prompts trend for portraits and ecommerce images where authenticity matters (Skylum).

prompt: Generate branded product photoshoot mockups from a single image — consistent lighting, multiple product variations, agency-ready comps
comment: From Ben Milsom's tests: practical for agencies automating content and mockups at scale (YouTube/video tests).

prompt: Create JSON-style vector logo packs — modern tech logo in black & purple, flat vector, SVG-ready, consistent icon set
comment: JSON/vector logo generation is trending for automation and consistent brand assets (credited in prompt experiments).>
